name: runPythonScript
description: Execute a Python 3 script with access to the robot tools namespace. Use this when you need low-latency loops, conditionals, or batching when invoking MCP tools. Inside the script call any other tools simply as `tools.FUNCNAME(arg=value, ...)`. The combined console output is returned as text.

script.description: Python 3 source code to execute. Use the provided `tools` namespace to call MCP functions.
